survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from commuters about their satisfaction with urban commuter rail services, including punctuality, cleanliness, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the urban commuter rail service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify responses. Ensure options cover all typical usage patterns.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the urban commuter rail service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when using the commuter rail service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to prioritize factors. Limit to 3 selections for focused feedback.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when using the commuter rail service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the punctuality of the commuter rail service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the punctuality of the commuter rail service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the commuter rail service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the commuter rail service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the commuter rail service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring likelihood to recommend. This is a key metric for service evaluation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the commuter rail service to others?
